info.author: Yanwar Solahudin
info.description:
Gurka Toolkits
--------------

To use (with caution), simply do::

    >>> from gurka import toolkits
    >>>
    >>> # Example rupiah formating
    >>> money_idn = 45000
    >>> toolkits.to_rupiah(money_idn)
    'Rp. 45,000.00'
    >>>
    >>> # Example using autonumber
    >>> toolkits.DEFAULT_PREFIX = "PRD" # PRD is a prefix code for product. 
    >>> toolkits.DEFAULT_OVERFLOW = 3 # Total digit autonumber
    >>> 
    >>> toolkits.autonumber()
    'PRD001'
    >>>
    >>> toolkits.autonumber(data=_)
    'PRD002'
    >>> toolkits.autonumber(data=_)
    'PRD003'
    >>> toolkits.autonumber(data=_)
    'PRD004'
info.name: gurka_toolkits
info.summary: Contains a set of helper kits that can help you for development.
info.html_description:
To use (with caution), simply do:

>>> from gurka import toolkits
>>>
>>> # Example rupiah formating
>>> money_idn = 45000
>>> toolkits.to_rupiah(money_idn)
'Rp. 45,000.00'
>>>
>>> # Example using autonumber
>>> toolkits.DEFAULT_PREFIX = "PRD" # PRD is a prefix code for product.
>>> toolkits.DEFAULT_OVERFLOW = 3 # Total digit autonumber
>>>
>>> toolkits.autonumber()
'PRD001'
>>>
>>> toolkits.autonumber(data=_)
'PRD002'
>>> toolkits.autonumber(data=_)
'PRD003'
>>> toolkits.autonumber(data=_)
'PRD004'
